item.description: PJ will be giving a reading from his new book, "God, No!", followed by a signing. Tickets required for the reading: get two free when you purchase a copy of "God, No!" from Brookline Booksmith. BB will also have a standby line the night of the event and will pipe the audio from the reading upstairs. The signing, which starts at 8pm, will not require a ticket. From the BB publicity email: "In this hilarious and thought-provoking collection of stories, broken down into 'The Penn Commandments', the world's loudest and most outspoken skeptic-magician-comedian and co-host of Showtime's Penn & Teller: Bullshit! And the Discovery Channel's upcoming series, Penn & Teller: Tell a Lie talks about atheism, magic, fatherhood, and much, much more."
item.name: Penn Jillette at Brookline Booksmith
